title: Ticket #2248: Condor-C to blahp failing due executable path
description: Jobs submitted by Condor to the blahp will fail if Condor doesn't provide the full pathname to the executable. If a pbs/lsf grid universe job is submitted directly by the user, this works file. But if the user submits a Condor-C job to turns into a pbs/lsf job on the remote schedd, the Cmd attribute contains the basename of the executable, which is relative to the directory indicated by the Iwd attribute. It appears the blahp doesn't try to construct the full path of the executable if Cmd contains just the basename.
